component.name: qtodotxt
component.summary: QTodoTxt is a cross-platform UI client for todo.txt files (see todo.txt)

description.p: It allows you to manage projects, contexts in a GTD way. You can use it on Linux, Windows, Mac Os X and there are even IPhone and Android mobile App !
Your todo.txt file can be sync with Dropbox, Owncloud or what you want, it's just a text file !
